metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6611 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: mediaserver in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48X and 6.0 before 2015-11-01 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information, and consequently bypass an unspecified protection mechanism, via unknown vectors, aka internal bugs 23905951, 23912202, 23953967, 23696300, 23600291, 23756261, 23541506, 23284974, 23542351, and 23542352, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-8074.

notes.Note: jdstrand> as with previous stagefright issues, this issue affects Ubuntu's android packages, but not in a way that is exposed to apps.  See CVE-2015-1538 for details

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
